String.string: I know it sounds crazy, but if I have eyes, I can make gold!
I can be generous now, because soon I'll have more gold than anyone!
Eliminate Sihran Avaritians in the Golden Labyrinth, and collect their eyes. [You must select Golden Labyrinth (Solo) from the {@LinkCreature:208#1501#Teleportal} to advance this quest.]
Deliver the eyes to Alchemist Krudo.
